dn27:21.4_1: evametassa khattiyamaṇḍalassa porāṇena aggaññena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesaṁyeva sattānaṁ, anaññesaṁ. Sadisānaṁyeva, no asadisānaṁ. Dhammeneva, no adhammena.
dn27:21.5_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca.
dn27:22.2_1: yatra hi nāma adinnādānaṁ paññāyissati, garahā paññāyissati, musāvādo paññāyissati, daṇḍādānaṁ paññāyissati, pabbājanaṁ paññāyissati.
dn27:22.3_0: Yannūna mayaṁ pāpake akusale dhamme vāheyyāmā’ti.
dn27:22.5_0: Pāpake akusale dhamme vāhentīti kho, vāseṭṭha, ‘brāhmaṇā,
dn27:22.6_0: Te araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭiyo karitvā paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti vītaṅgārā vītadhūmā pannamusalā sāyaṁ sāyamāsāya pāto pātarāsāya gāmanigamarājadhāniyo osaranti ghāsamesamānā.
dn27:22.7_0: Te ghāsaṁ paṭilabhitvā punadeva araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti.
dn27:22.9_1: sattā araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭiyo karitvā paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyanti,
dn27:22.9_2: vītaṅgārā vītadhūmā pannamusalā sāyaṁ sāyamāsāya pāto pātarāsāya gāmanigamarājadhāniyo osaranti ghāsamesamānā.
dn27:22.10_0: Te ghāsaṁ paṭilabhitvā punadeva araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭīsu jhāyantī’ti,
dn27:23.1_1: sattānaṁ ekacce sattā araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭīsu taṁ jhānaṁ anabhisambhuṇamānā gāmasāmantaṁ nigamasāmantaṁ osaritvā ganthe karontā acchanti.
dn27:23.3_1: sattā araññāyatane paṇṇakuṭīsu taṁ jhānaṁ anabhisambhuṇamānā gāmasāmantaṁ nigamasāmantaṁ osaritvā ganthe karontā acchanti, na dānime jhāyantī’ti.
dn27:23.5_0: Hīnasammataṁ kho pana, vāseṭṭha, tena samayena hoti, tadetarahi seṭṭhasammataṁ.
dn27:23.6_1: evametassa brāhmaṇamaṇḍalassa porāṇena aggaññena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesaṁyeva sattānaṁ,
dn27:23.6_2: anaññesaṁ sadisānaṁyeva no asadisānaṁ dhammeneva, no adhammena.
dn27:23.7_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca.
dn27:24.1_1: sattānaṁ ekacce sattā methunaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya visukammante payojesuṁ.
dn27:24.2_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya visukammante payojentīti kho, vāseṭṭha, ‘vessā,
dn27:24.3_1: evametassa vessamaṇḍalassa porāṇena aggaññena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesaññeva sattānaṁ anaññesaṁ sadisānaṁyeva, no asadisānaṁ, dhammeneva no adhammena.
dn27:24.4_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca.
dn27:25.1_1: sattānaṁ ye te sattā avasesā te luddācārā khuddācārā ahesuṁ.
dn27:25.3_1: evametassa suddamaṇḍalassa porāṇena aggaññena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesaṁyeva sattānaṁ anaññesaṁ, sadisānaṁyeva no asadisānaṁ, dhammeneva, no adhammena.
dn27:25.4_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca.
dn27:26.1_1: yaṁ khattiyopi sakaṁ dhammaṁ garahamāno agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati:
dn27:26.5_1: sakaṁ dhammaṁ garahamāno agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati:

dn27:29.1_0: Khattiyopi kho, vāseṭṭha, kāyena dvayakārī, vācāya dvayakārī, manasā dvayakārī,
dn27:29.1_1: vimissadiṭṭhiko vimissadiṭṭhikammasamādāno vimissadiṭṭhikammasamādānahetu kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī hoti.
dn27:29.5_0: samaṇopi kho, vāseṭṭha, kāyena dvayakārī, vācāya dvayakārī, manasā dvayakārī,
dn27:29.5_1: vimissadiṭṭhiko vimissadiṭṭhikammasamādāno vimissadiṭṭhikammasamādānahetu kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī hoti.
dn27:30.1_1: kāyena saṁvuto vācāya saṁvuto manasā saṁvuto sattannaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanamanvāya diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyati.
dn27:30.5_1: kāyena saṁvuto vācāya saṁvuto manasā saṁvuto sattannaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanamanvāya diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyati.
dn27:31.1_1: catunnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ yo hoti bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,
dn27:31.1_2: so nesaṁ aggamakkhāyati dhammeneva, no adhammena.
dn27:31.2_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca.
dn27:32.1_0: Brahmunā pesā, vāseṭṭha, sanaṅkumārena gāthā bhāsitā:
dn27:32.6_1: brahmunā sanaṅkumārena gāthā sugītā, no duggītā. Subhāsitā, no dubbhāsitā. Atthasaṁhitā, no anatthasaṁhitā. Anumatā mayā.
